biotools.summary: Tool to assist in the design of multiplex PCR assays. It takes a set of DNA sequences and other experimental information as input and provides a set of multiplex PCR assays intended to cover as many of the user-supplied sequences as possible.

bioschemas.name: MuPlex
bioschemas.summary: Tool to assist in the design of multiplex PCR assays. It takes a set of DNA sequences and other experimental information as input and provides a set of multiplex PCR assays intended to cover as many of the user-supplied sequences as possible.
